meanings.definition: Give (a gift that one has received) to someone else.
meanings.sent1: I will regift this book to my friend for her birthday.
meanings.sent2: It is common to regift items that we don't need.
meanings.sent3: I decided to regift the ugly sweater to my cousin, hoping she will like it.
meanings.sent4: She likes to regift kindness to everyone she meets.
meanings.sent5: He will regift the love letter to his crush, hoping she will appreciate it.

meanings.definition: The act of giving a gift that one has received to someone else.
meanings.sent1: Regifts are a great way to recycle unwanted presents.
meanings.sent2: She received a regift from her coworker at the office party.
meanings.sent3: The regift exchange at the party was full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: The regift box was filled with various items from previous celebrations.
meanings.sent5: He found joy in the regift he received, knowing it was passed on with care.
